bill_title: Congratulating the Parkston High School girls' volleyball team on winning the 1999 state tournament.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Congratulating the Parkston High School girls' volleyball team on winning the 1999 state tournament. WHEREAS, the Parkston High School girls' volleyball team has won the 1999 state tournament with a 5-1 record, after accumulating a 28-5-2 record in regular season and regional play; and WHEREAS, such an honor is the result of hard work, perseverance, leadership, and cooperation; and WHEREAS, these are all virtues which the State of South Dakota wishes to foster and instill in its youth; NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-fourth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the members of the Parkston High School girls' volleyball team and their coach, Ms. Janet Beyer-Proehl, be congratulated and recognized for their achievement.
